data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Forges, Bertrand Richer De (2007): A new genus and new species of leucosiid crab from New Caledonia, with a note on the validity of Tanaoa serenei (Richer de Forges, 1983) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura). Zootaxa 1662: 15-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179982
